name: Gan Dath
description:
Gan Dath’s is a 3D game for desktops, with orbit and gravity 360º mechanics and minimalist graphics.
Zephan is one of the only survivors of the Phantel Planet, which is disappearing after the Order of the Grigio stole the six colors that maintain the life in the Gan Dath universe.
Each planet was taken by a Grigio who keeps a color hidden and will make everything in his power so that Zephan won't find it.
